Key Match Events: Celtics made 19 of 39 3-point attempts and overwhelmed Rockets with offensive precision.
Celtics scored a combined 43 points from Derrick White and Jayson Tatum.
10-0 run out of a timeout with Holiday nailing two 3-pointers and Luke Kornet adding a pair of dunks.
Jalen Green led Rockets with 27 points while Alperen Sengun added 14 points and seven rebounds.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Rockets were injury-depleted with Amen Thompson, Tari Eason, and Jabari Smith Jr. sidelined.
Smith is scheduled to undergo surgery and is expected to be sidelined for four to eight weeks.
Others: Celtics extended to a 17-4 run and double-digit lead Houston.
Boston led by as many as 28 points in the final period.
